author: Bethany Jones, Jonathan Jones
title: Gov. Cuomo is wrong, covid-19 is anything but an equalizer - The Washington Post
description: Gov. Cuomo is wrong, covid-19 is anything but an equalizer The Washington Post Watch live: New York Gov. Andrew Cuomo gives an update on coronavirus | TheHill The Hill Cuomo gives update on coronavirus in New York Washington Post View Full Coverage on Google …
content:
Certainly, Gov. Cuomos broader point, that no one is immune to the coronavirus, is soberingly valid. But his phrasing is misleading.
Simply put, to call any virus a great equalizer is false. Pandemics amplify existing inequalities, usually hurting the poor w… [+5986 chars]
